channel.title: Full Browser on posts
channel.description: Recent content in Full Browser on posts

item.title: Real Full Browsing in Korea
item.description: LG Telelcom, the smallest of three telecom operators in Korea launched mobile full browsing service with an attractive fixed-rate plan that allows unlimited data download within 6 month and 1G bytes after then for 6,000 won ($6) per month. Other telecom operators also have provided mobile full browsing service, but the rate plan is very expensive. For example, SK telecom charges about 3072Won(3$) per 1MB for data transfer. The full browser was provided by Infraware that is a Korean company.
